fields.label: External URL
fields.name: blog_url
fields.instructions: If this is an external article, put the URL here. Otherwise, leave blank.

fields.label: External Article Excerpt
fields.name: blog_external_excerpt
fields.instructions: Only enter information here if it is an article from an external link.

sub_fields.label: Block Scrolling Menu Name
sub_fields.name: block_scrolling_menu_name
sub_fields.instructions: Leave empty to not include in scrolling menu.

sub_fields.label: Block ID
sub_fields.name: block_id
sub_fields.instructions:
This field should be unique in this page and separated by dash, in lowercase.
Leave empty if you would like to use "Block Scrolling Menu Name" as the block ID.

sub_fields.label: Block Grid Width
sub_fields.name: block_grid_width
sub_fields.instructions: Width of content in grid layout.

sub_fields.label: Block Scrolling Menu Name
sub_fields.name: block_scrolling_menu_name
sub_fields.instructions: Leave empty to not include in scrolling menu.

sub_fields.label: Block ID
sub_fields.name: block_id
sub_fields.instructions:
This field should be unique in this page and separated by dash, in lowercase.
Leave empty if you would like to use "Block Scrolling Menu Name" as the block ID.

sub_fields.label: Overlap Height
sub_fields.name: overlap_height
sub_fields.instructions: Overlap height of the image (in pixel)
